Hydras:

"Good... "replied the male "Then you have your command, Maxima, just 
do it when situation needs it... but I would beg you that watch her 
carefully, Perceptor could help and you should bring her to base in 
case that you think that is necesary... I just like her death in 
case that doesn't exist other choise, my dear." and Hydras added" 
what do you think that she thinks about you, Maxima? does she 
cosider a sort of friend?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> She pondered that. To terminate another.... even if they were a 
decent 
> warrior. 
> 
> She nodded once, "Thy will be done, Hydras," she soft purred in a 
slightly 
> deep voice.
> 
> Was rather interesting that Rodimus had chosen another equal ... 
even after 
> poor little Arcee. ahhh, how she enjoyed watching her perish. & 
even watch 
> Elita-1 perish. 
> 
> "Rodimus won't even have the chance to see her again. Functioning 
or 
> non-functioning."
